Tool

NameFuzzy Union (OR)

AuthorAntonio Boggia and Gianluca Massei (c) 2004
Specificationgrid

Description

Calculates the union (max operator) for each grid cell of the selected grids. e-mail Gianluca Massei: g_massa@libero.it e-mail Antonio Boggia: boggia@unipg.it

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grids Grid list (input)GRIDS
Output
UnionGrid (output)OR
Options
Operator TypeChoiceTYPEAvailable Choices: [0] max(a, b) (non-interactive) [1] a + b - a * b [2] min(1, a + b) Default: 0
